title: (x) Yohji - Helvetica Ultra Compressed {Marc O}
content:
Does anyone recognise this font, it looks like Folio T Bold Extra Condensed, but perhaps a little more elongated?   
   
 ![yohji](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221828im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/24868.jpg)

 [‹ Tri Line, Shadow font or ....?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221828/http:/typophile.com/node/2839 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) broken outline font - Esso {Mike F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221828/http:/typophile.com/node/2830 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content:
I looked at [Helvetica Inserat](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221828/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica-inserat/helvetica-inserat/testdrive.html?s=YOHJI&p=48), but you'll have to squish it. And the bar on the H is also not at the same place.   
   
Looks like one for them experts.
OK. Thanks for your help you two.
